mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.CATEGORY_CD, OC.COMPANY_ID, OC.COMPANY_NAME, B.TITLE, B.CREATE_ID, U.USER_NAME, B.CREATE_DT FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN T_BOARD_OPEN_COMPANY OC ON B.BOARD_ID = OC.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO U ON B.CREATE_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE CATEGORY_CD = 'SYSTEM' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_CD = 'SYSTEM' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
